Info.AboutKuroDescription: With Kuro you can check the product status of your local supermarkets and see the product availability before you set off to shop.
Info.MotivationDescription: Kuro originated as an idea for a solution approach to the topic of "status monitoring of supermarkets" as part of the "WirVsVirus Hackathon". The application was planned and the basis was completely implemented. After the Hackthon the development team decided to continue the development of kuro.

Products.ProductsIntroText: Here you can find and see all products of kuro. If you are looking for a special product enter its name in the given search box below.
